pr_title: fix: Inform user that the copybook may be nested if downloading faile…

timeline.message: fix: Inform user that the copybook may be nested if downloading failed #301

timeline.bodyText: you have updated one string in a condition which now always return true so entry this condition, you have to update the source of the reasonMsg which is in the extension.ts
timeline.author: sergiuilie

replies.bodyText: I do believe that the message is wrong in essence, if you just updated the settings why would you like to update with correct settings again, are you making sure on the technical way that in order to throw this message the user has provided the wrong configuration?
replies.author: sergiuilie

timeline.bodyText: Same comment here, are you making sure that all the copybooks which are not downloaded are nested? if no, then the message should be rewritten
timeline.author: sergiuilie

timeline.message:
fix: Edit messages for user that,  the copybook may be nested if downloading failed  #303
